Core setup:string> 3rd party Libraries used in the demo:string> Additional UX / Design features:string>
- Kotlin
- MVVM architecture using JetPack ViewModel
- Navigation done via Jetpack Navigation component
- Coroutines / Flow for asynchronous tasks and event broadcast
- Room for caching the loaded data and persisting the favorites
- LiveData and Databindings to render the screens states - Dagger 2 for dependency injection
- Retrofit 2 and Gson for http / Rest requests
- Glide to load images easily
- Binding Collection Adapter to facilitate databinding in the recyclerView - Splash screen
- Usage of "include" layout in order to demo "reusable" visual components
- Transition: enter / exit are animated for a nicer experience
- Toolbar menu item and about page to list the content of this app so you dont miss anything :)
- All icons are vector based to support multiple screen densitity and size
